content.rendered:
Foodle is a puzzle game that’s perfect for chefs and food enthusiasts. If you’re tired of the usual dull word puzzles, then Foodle is the game for you. The game draws inspiration from culinary ingredients and chefs, and challenges players to guess food-related words using only six tries. How many food terms can you come up with? Put your knowledge of cuisine to the test by playing Foodle today.

How to play Foodle

Playing Foodle is easy, even for beginners. To start, players must try to guess a food-related term six times. Each guess must be a valid five-letter word related to food. If the word you guessed isn’t on the game’s word list, the algorithm will prompt you to try another word. Players get six chances to guess the correct word from Foodle every day, with a new puzzle answer added every 24 hours.

Guess a new food word

To win the game, players must generate as many hints as they can on a daily basis to guess a new food word. Each guess must be a valid word, and players must keep track of the time remaining for the next word. To beat the game, players must have a good grasp of the language and be able to connect the right words.

To play Foodle, enter a valid 5 letter food-related word

You have 6 attempts to guess the current word. After each guess, the tile color will change to give clues. Guess correctly in as few attempts as possible. You can share your score on social media. Guesses and results will be color-coded but the word will remain hidden. Building intrigue around guessing the daily dish will drive interest. Challenge friends to guess yesterday’s word. One new word daily!
